DOC.brief_summary: Beneficial effect of chronic hydration with salt supplementation in patients with recurrent unexplained syncope is not established. We sought to determine if chronic oral rehydration with salt supplementation improved the tolerance and hemodynamic responses of patients with unexplained recurrent syncope.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Chronic Oral Hydration in Patients With Recurrent Unexplained Syncope
DOC.criteria: Syncopal and/or near syncopal episodes at least twice within the prior 3 months Neurological disease Structural heart disease Metabolic and psychiatric illness
